mapper.select: SELECT t.todo_id AS todoId, t.workout_id AS workoutId, t.exercise_id AS exerciseId, e.name AS exerciseName, t.sets_number AS setsNumber, t.reps_target AS repsTarget, t.weight AS weight, t.rest_time AS restTime, t.is_completed AS isCompleted, e.default_calories_per_set AS caloriesPerRep FROM todos t JOIN exercises e ON t.exercise_id = e.exercise_id WHERE t.date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE} AND t.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY t.workout_id ASC, t.sets_number ASC
